TextView.android:text: Bad Ending: As you chose not to believe, your life unfolded in unpredictable and divergent paths. Freed from the constraints of a predetermined fate, you embraced the uncertainty of your choices. The decisions you made, the relationships you formed, and the challenges you faced were all products of your independent will. While the absence of the unknown power brought forth a sense of liberation, it also introduced an element of unpredictability that both intrigued and challenged you. You grappled with the consequences of your choices, moments of self-doubt crept in, and you start questioning the validity of your own capabilities.
